metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4011 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SwapCreateRegister function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server This is ZDI-CAN-14952

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.11-1ubuntu1.2').
xwayland package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.1-0ubuntu1.1').
